attachments.title: hashicorp/terraform-ls
attachments.text: Terraform Language Server. Contribute to hashicorp/terraform-ls development by creating an account on GitHub.

text:
うぉ、公式で出したのか
juliosueiras氏のどうなるかなぁ…
vim-lspで起動してみたけどうまく動かないなあ...

```Sun 29 Mar 2020 06:51:55 AM JST:["lsp#register_server","server registered","efm-langserver"]

TextDocumentClientCapabilitiesにtypeHierarchyなんてあったのか... 仕様書にみあたらない...
これか <https://github.com/microsoft/language-server-protocol/issues/468>

attachments.title: Call Hierarchy · Issue #468 · microsoft/language-server-protocol
attachments.text: The LSP should define a request from the client to server to obtain callers for a definition as well as obtaining the containing callable definitions (e.g. containing method declaration). Based on ...
